Name: UNCORPOREAL - Fluffy!
About the game: 'Fluffy!', an experimental VR short, is pure camp horror with a script based loosely on the iconic 80's horror film 'An American Werewolf in London'. A surrealistic motel is imagined in the world of the original film, starring a peculiar bellmen (played by Michael Donaldson)who's obsessed with 'pets'. Run length is 1 minute 30 seconds.
